pychell API reference¶

Forward Models¶

class pychell.rvs.forward_models.ForwardModels(forward_model_settings, model_blueprints, order_num)¶

Bases: list

Contains individual forward models in a list, and other helpful attributes, primarily for RVs.

target_function¶

The function which optimizes the model.

Type

function

template_augmenter¶

The function to augment the stellar template.

Type

function

order_num¶

The order number.

Type

int

tag¶

star name + user tag.

Type

str

n_spec¶

The number of spectra.

Type

int

n_nights¶

The number of nights.

Type

int

BJDS¶

The barycentric JD.

Type

np.ndarray

BJDS_nightly¶

The nightly (average) barycentric JDs.

Type

np.ndarray

n_obs_nights¶

Contains number of observations on each night.

Type

np.ndarray

bc_vels¶

The barycentric velocity corrections.

Type

np.ndarray

do_xcorr¶

Whether or not cross-correlation is performed.

Type

bool

rvs_dict¶

Contains all RVs. Use rvs_dict.keys() to see available entries.

Type

dict

create_output_dirs(output_path_root)¶

Creates output dirs and filenames for outputs.

Parameters

output_path_root (str) – The root output path where this run is to be stored.

fit_spectra(iter_num)¶

Forward models all spectra and performs xcorr if set.

Parameters

iter_num (int) – The iteration number.

init_parameters()¶

Initializes the parameters for each forward model

load_templates()¶

Load the initial templates and store in both.

opt_init_params()¶

Perform a crude cross-correlation, and perform sanity checks on params.

print_init_summary()¶

Print a summary for this run.

save_results()¶

Saves the forward model results and RVs.

save_rvs()¶

Saves the forward model results and RVs.

static solver_wrapper(forward_model, iter_num, n_spec_tot, output_path_plot=None, verbose_print=False, verbose_plot=False)¶

A wrapper for forward modeling and cross-correlating a single spectrum.

Parameters

  • forward_model (ForwardModel) – The forward model object

  • iter_num (int) – The iteration number.

  • n_spec_tot (int) – The total number of spectra for printing purposes.

  • output_path_plot (str, optional) – output path for plots. Defaults to None and uses object default.

  • verbose_print (bool, optional) – Whether or not to print optimization results. Defaults to False.

  • verbose_plot (bool, optional) – Whether or not to plot templates with the forward model. Defaults to False.

Returns

The updated forward model since we possibly fit in parallel.

Return type

forward_model (ForwardModel)

sort()¶

Sorts the objects by BJD, in place.

Model Components¶

class pychell.rvs.model_components.BasicFringingModel(blueprint, wave_bounds, order_num=None)¶

Bases: pychell.rvs.model_components.EmpiricalMult

A basic Fabry-Perot cavity model.

Base initialization for a model component.

Parameters

  • blueprint (dict) – The blueprints to construct this component from.

  • order_num (int) – The image order number.

class pychell.rvs.model_components.EmpiricalMult(blueprint, wave_bounds, order_num=None)¶

Bases: pychell.rvs.model_components.MultModelComponent

Base class for an empirically derived multiplicative (or log-additive) spectral component (i.e., based purely on parameters, no templates involved).

Base initialization for a model component.

Parameters

  • blueprint (dict) – The blueprints to construct this component from.

  • order_num (int) – The image order number.

class pychell.rvs.model_components.FullBlazeModel(blueprint, wave_bounds, order_num=None)¶

Bases: pychell.rvs.model_components.EmpiricalMult

A full blaze transmission model. A sinc^(d) and an additive cubic spline correction are used.

n_splines¶

The number of wavelength splines.

Type

int

n_delay_splines¶

The number of iterations to delay the splines.

Type

int

splines_enabled¶

Whether or not the splines are enabled.

Type

bool

blaze_wave_estimate¶

The estimate of the blaze wavelegnth. If not provided, defaults to the average of the wavelength grid provided in the build method.

Type

bool

spline_set_points¶

The location of the spline knots.

Type

np.ndarray

Base initialization for a model component.

Parameters

  • blueprint (dict) – The blueprints to construct this component from.

  • order_num (int) – The image order number.

class pychell.rvs.model_components.GasCellModel(blueprint, wave_bounds, order_num=None)¶

Bases: pychell.rvs.model_components.TemplateMult

A gas cell model which is consistent across orders.

Base initialization for a model component.

Parameters

  • blueprint (dict) – The blueprints to construct this component from.

  • order_num (int) – The image order number.

A gas cell model which is not consistent across orders.

  • order_num (int) – The image order number.

class pychell.rvs.model_components.LSFHermiteModel(blueprint, dl, nx_model, order_num=None)¶

Bases: pychell.rvs.model_components.LSFModel

A Hermite Gaussin LSF model. The model is a sum of Gaussians of constant width but coefficients to enforce orthonormality.

hermdeg¶

The degree of the hermite model

Type

int

Base initialization for a model component.

Parameters

  • blueprint (dict) – The blueprints to construct this component from.

  • order_num (int) – The image order number.

class pychell.rvs.model_components.LSFModel(blueprint, dl, nx_model, order_num=None)¶

Bases: pychell.rvs.model_components.SpectralComponent

A base class for an LSF (line spread function) model.

compress¶

The number of lsf points is equal to the number of model pix / compress.

Type

int

dl¶

The step size of the high resolution fidicual wavelength grid the model is convolved on. Must be evenly spaced.

Type

float

nx_model¶

The number of model pixels in the high resolution fidicual wavelength grid.

Type

float

nx¶

The number of points in the lsf grid.

Type

int

x¶

The lsf grid.

Type

np.ndarray

Base initialization for a model component.

Parameters

  • blueprint (dict) – The blueprints to construct this component from.

  • order_num (int) – The image order number.

class pychell.rvs.model_components.LSFModelKnown(blueprint, dl, nx_model, order_num=None)¶

Bases: pychell.rvs.model_components.LSFModel

A container for a known LSF. In reality this can and probably should not be used and avoided.

Base initialization for a model component.

Parameters

  • blueprint (dict) – The blueprints to construct this component from.

  • order_num (int) – The image order number.

class pychell.rvs.model_components.ResidualBlazeModel(blueprint, wave_bounds, order_num=None)¶

Bases: pychell.rvs.model_components.EmpiricalMult

Residual blaze transmission model, ideally used after a flat field correction. A quadratic and an additive cubic spline correction are used.

n_splines¶

The number of wavelength splines.

Type

int

n_delay_splines¶

The number of iterations to delay the splines.

Type

int

splines_enabled¶

Whether or not the splines are enabled.

Type

bool

The estimate of the blaze wavelegnth. If not provided, defaults to the average of the wavelength grid provided in the build method.

Type

bool

spline_set_points¶

The location of the spline knots.

Type

np.ndarray

Base initialization for a model component.

Parameters

  • blueprint (dict) – The blueprints to construct this component from.

  • order_num (int) – The image order number.

class pychell.rvs.model_components.StarModelOrderDependent(blueprint, wave_bounds, order_num=None)¶

Bases: pychell.rvs.model_components.TemplateMult

A star model which is order dependent. For now this is only used for Minerva-Australis.

Base initialization for a model component.

Parameters

  • order_num (int) – The image order number.

class pychell.rvs.model_components.TelluricModelTAPAS(blueprint, wave_bounds, order_num=None)¶

Bases: pychell.rvs.model_components.TemplateMult

A telluric model based on Templates obtained from TAPAS. These templates should be pre-fetched from TAPAS and specific to the observatory. Each species has a unique depth, but the model is locked to a common Doppler shift.

species¶

The names (strings) of the telluric species.

Type

list

n_species¶

The number of telluric species.

Type

int

species_enabled¶

A dictionary with species as keys, and boolean values for items (True=enabled, False=disabled)

Type

bool

species_input_files¶

A list of input files (strings) for the individual species.

Type

list

Base initialization for a model component.

Parameters

  • blueprint (dict) – The blueprints to construct this component from.

  • order_num (int) – The image order number.

Bases: pychell.rvs.model_components.MultModelComponent

A base class for a template based multiplicative model.

If provided, stores the full path + filename of the input file.

class pychell.rvs.model_components.WaveSolModelFull(blueprint, wave_bounds, pix_bounds, nx, order_num=None)¶

Bases: pychell.rvs.model_components.WavelengthSolutionModel

Class for a full wavelength solution. A “base” solution is provided by a quadratic through set points, and a cubic spline offset is added on to capture any local perturbations.

n_splines¶

The number of wavelength splines.

Type

int

n_delay_splines¶

The number of iterations to delay the splines.

Type

int

splines_enabled¶

Whether or not the splines are enabled.

Type

bool

base_pixel_set_points¶

The three pixel points to use as set points in the quadratic.

Type

np.ndarray

base_wave_zero_points¶

Estimates of the corresonding zero points of base_pixel_set_points.

Type

np.ndarray

spline_pixel_set_points¶

The location of the spline knots.

Type

np.ndarray

Base initialization for a model component.

Parameters

  • blueprint (dict) – The blueprints to construct this component from.

  • order_num (int) – The image order number.

class pychell.rvs.model_components.WavelengthSolutionModel(blueprint, wave_bounds, pix_bounds, nx, order_num=None)¶

Bases: pychell.rvs.model_components.SpectralComponent

A base class for a wavelength solution (i.e., conversion from pixels to wavelength).

The left and right pixel bounds which correspond to wave_bounds.

list

int
